text: I am all about the last two panels. Easily a solid 4 rating.

name: eric
text: Whenever I watch movies like nine queens or heist I feel  like this is how one side of the plot should always go down. No one is that clever.

text: Word. But then the movie would probably end in 20 minutes when a scam/heist runs perfectly.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: minimalist theater. maybe then they would show a trilogy of movies featuring the same situation. like..movie one is the planning before the heist..number two is the actual gig and three is the daring escape/getaway. or maybe just a movie told in three parts.

text: Nice Pete got out of prison by fabricating a ladder out of used condom packages. Then he jumped the wall.

name: taiiga
text: best two consecutive strips in achewood chronology, there i said it

name: rowboat
text: That's bold. Off the top of my head, I'd have to go with "Ray gets sort of stoned"/"Ray is high under the table."

name: ford
text: It must be almost depressing to feel that there hasn't been a pair of strips better than these in four damn years.  I'm with rowboat on this one though.

text: Nice Pete cuts off a finger on the internet/ Nice Pete as the Death Sound mutilates himself in front of Little Nephew and his goth friends
